item.title: Life without wires : ADB over WiFi
item.description: Tired of being tied to your laptop/desktop while debugging your android apps ? Well let me break it to you â€“ You are NOT the FIRST person to do it. Its a common practice to tether your device via a USB cable to the host machine and debug android apps.Well here is something for you that is going to set you free. Yes literally. You can run adb over WiFi (period)
